guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for clozapine and CYP2D6

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily D member 6

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166309445

text.html: "Dose reduction may be necessary in patients who are CYP2D6 poor metabolizers." See label for more information.

implications: "These individuals [CY2D6 poor metabolizers] may develop higher than expected plasma concentrations of clozapine when given usual doses."

citations.title: Drugs@FDA: Drug Product Clozaril (clozapine), NDA019758, HLS Therapeutics (USA), Inc.
